conversations.body_text: ID 号为 9098 和 9683 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9098  
      主题: SSN4144  
      描述:  Goedemiddag, Wij hebben nog steeds niet de bestelling met nr SSN4144 ontvangen.  
 Wanneer kunnen we deze verwachten? 
 Met vriendelijke groet,  
 Kees van Keeken

合并来自工单9683  
      主题: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4144, how did it go?  
      描述:  Hello, 
  I did not receive the product. 
 I tried to contact you before but did not got any answer.  
 Please contact me. 
   
 Kees van Keeken  
 
 
  
 Op wo 31 dec 2025, 17:00 schreef SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>: 
 
 
 
 
 Hello Kees,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

 
  
 Hello Kees,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.

Hi k van Keeken,     We sincerely apologize for the delayed reply. Due to a high volume of emails during the peak season, there has been some delay in processing. Your order has already been shipped, and below is the tracking information.

Thank you for your reply and delivery tracking information. As you can see
the product is in Alphen aan den Rijn since 18 december but still not
delivered.
We would like to get a proper solution.

Kind regards,

Kees van Keeken

Op wo 7 jan 2026, 09:47 schreef service@simsonn.com
Hi k van Keeken,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for a replacement shipment and included an additional VAM Haptic as compensation. Here is your logistics tracking link:
